actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on certain internal combustion, 2-stroke-cycle, piston-type engines.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide for the suspension of duty, through December 31, 1992, on certain two-stroke cycle piston engines to be installed in vehicles designed for snow travel, golf carts, and nonamphibious all-terrain vehicles designed to carry one passenger.

titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on certain internal combustion, 2-stroke-cycle, piston-type engines.
